entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
